statements: SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE company_name = 'Apple';
SELECT company_name, stock_price FROM market_trends WHERE revenue > 1000000;
SELECT id, revenue, profit FROM market_trends ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_name, stock_price, profit FROM market_trends WHERE profit < 0 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE profit > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM market_trends WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT id, company_name, stock_price FROM market_trends WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT company_name, profit FROM market_trends WHERE revenue BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY profit ASC;
SELECT count(*) AS Total_Entries, SUM(revenue) AS Total_Revenue FROM market_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT id, symbol, price, volume FROM financial_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 1000 AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(volume) AS avg_volume FROM financial_data;
SELECT trend, start_date, end_date FROM market_trends WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM financial_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT') AND price > 1000 ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE opening_price > 100;
SELECT id, trend_prediction, confidence_level FROM market_analysis WHERE confidence_level >= 0.8;
SELECT sentiment_score, news_headline FROM market_sentiment WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(closing_price) AS max_closing_price FROM financial_data GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT sentiment_score, news_headline FROM market_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY report_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(confidence_level) AS avg_confidence_level, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM market_analysis MA JOIN market_sentiment MS ON MA.id = MS.id;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC, closing_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT trend_type, trend_score FROM market_trends WHERE trend_score >= 7.5 ORDER BY trend_score DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results JOIN market_trends ON analysis_results.trend_id = market_trends.id WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' AND analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, preferred_stock_symbol, preferred_trend_type FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT id, symbol FROM financial_news WHERE news_title LIKE '%market%'
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume < 1000 AND price < 50
SELECT * FROM historic_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY closing_price DESC
SELECT index_name, index_value FROM market_indices
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT * FROM historic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
